title: Date Display Format
description: Display format for date values. Controls how dates are presented to users, not how they are stored. Storage always uses ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD). Common formats: YYYY-MM-DD (ISO), MM/DD/YYYY (US), DD-MM-YYYY (European).

specs.title: Accept valid date format
specs.then: the format is accepted and dates display in US format

specs.title: Use default format when not specified
specs.given: a date field configuration without format property
specs.then: the date is displayed in default ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

specs.title: Reject invalid format tokens
specs.then: validation error is returned with message 'Invalid date format pattern'
